Title: Recruit aspiring artists
Description:
We recruit both new and sophisticated artists to guide them in their individual
artistic career.

Title: Generate publicity
Description: Publicity is the single most important element in creative professions. Our vocation is to make our artists' names well known through advertising and mediation.

Title: Express it your way
Description: We consider artistic freedom a major part of success. Thus not restricting our artists' creative projects and ideas.

Title: Support
Description: We always keep our artists' best interest in mind and support them so they and their art can stand in the limelight.
